item.title: About
item.description: üöÄ Welcome to the Murdoch Coding Club! üéÆ Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey into the world of coding and information technology? Look no further! üòÉ üë®‚Äçüíª About Us üë©‚Äçüíª At the Murdoch University Coding Club, we are more than just a club; we are a dynamic, student-led community dedicated to the magic of programming and IT. Our mission? To create an inclusive space where students from all walks of life can come together, share their knowledge, and supercharge their skills!

item.title: Prose
The Coding Clinic
item.description: The coding clinic is a chill, inclusive enviroment where you can drop in and have a chat with experianced, battle harned students that can provide some assistance with programming. In these clinics you can seek help debuging your code, we can show you the steps to take and walk you through it so that you’ll learn the skills to succeed, we can also offer tips and tricks for programming along with constructing algorithims.

item.title: 2024 Events
item.description: üöÄ SPECIAL EVENTS Note, times and locations yet to be confirmed. Ensure you have joined our Discord for annoucments when the dates are finalised. 🐙 GitHub / IDE’s An interactive workshop on version control with GitHub and an overview of Integrated Development Environments. 🌐 Web Design Introduction A beginner-friendly session on the basics of web design and development where you design your own portfolio page. 🎮 Shaders in Unreal Engine

item.title: Events
item.description: üåü 2023 Summer Events üåü üéÆ Unity Game Development Series Embark on a journey to create your own game with our multi-week Unity Game Development Series. Perfect for beginners, these workshops will guide you through programming and designing a small game in Unity, offering hands-on experience and foundational skills in game development. üîó GitHub & IDE Essentials Ideal for students preparing for ICT159 next semester, this workshop introduces the essentials of GitHub and Integrated Development Environments (IDEs).
